Let Us Help You Plan The Perfect New York City Romantic Getaway!
Our location at the crosswords of Theater District and Hell’s Kitchen offers the ideal setting for an unforgettable New York City romantic stay.

Stay in one of our King Bedded Rooms, and take time to relax with a late check out. Includes a copy of the classic "An Affair to Remember" on DVD as a memento of your romantic stay at the Washington Jefferson Hotel.

Book Period: January 18th to February 14th, 2017. Stay Period: January 18th to March 31st, 2017. LOS restriction: 2 nights and longer. WJ’s website bookings only. Room categories, only Deluxe King and Superior King. Cancellation: 72 Hours day prior to arrival by 3:00 PM.

The package includes the following:

  • A King bedded room for two
  • "An Affair to Remember" DVD
  • Late 1:00 pm check out

Terms and Conditions:

Offer does not apply to groups of 5 or more rooms. Offer cannot be combined with any other discounts or promotions. Blackout dates may apply. Advance reservations required. Other restrictions apply. Room and occupancy taxes are not included.
Cancellation: 72 Hours day prior to arrival by 3:00 PM.
